body:
Comment 2: 
Ok, I figured it out - I didn't like having my ~ directory be /Users/jasmuth in the
terminal, so I set it to be /Users/jasmuth/Documents by messing with stuff. I copied the
version of .Xauthorithy from /Users/jasmuth to /Users/jasmuth/Documents, and now
everything works.

So, it was distinctly just me.
